whoWeAre.description: Since 2015, we have been working to add value to businesses in the digital world. With our experienced team and innovative approach, we serve as a trusted solution partner in our customers' digital transformation journey.

transparency.title: Transparency

vision.title: Our Vision

mission.title: Our Mission

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Share your information for customized solutions, we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

questions.question: What are the prices of your services?
questions.answer: Our service prices vary depending on the scope, requirements, and duration of the project. Please contact us for a customized quote.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
questions.answer: Project completion time varies depending on the complexity and scope of the project. A simple website can be completed in 2-4 weeks, while a comprehensive e-commerce project may take 2-3 months.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept bank transfers, credit cards, and installment payment options. We apply a payment plan of 40% at the start of the project, 30% during development, and 30% upon delivery.

questions.question: Do you provide support after project delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide free technical support for all our projects for 1 year. After this period, you can benefit from our monthly maintenance and support packages.
